page.title: 14 Clubs in Polstead
page.content: THE POLSTEAD FAYRE committee,once known as the CARE AND SHARE CLUB,exists to help organisations in the village.The Fayre is now an annual event on the Old Rectory meadow.The many clubs and fund raising organisations in the village run stalls and sideshows.One year people were able to follow the band of the Welsh Guards from the village green to the Fayre.The author John Rowe is keen to maintain the entertainment participation,and has encouraged the local children to join in performing verses about Polstead written as part of their school work.There had been a traditional fair on the village green which was revived in the 1950's but the venue has now changed.
